alert.note: Alert for Dawson; Prairie (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 20 at 4:31PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Prairie and south central Dawson Counties through 530 PM MDT... At 430 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles southeast of Terry, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fallon, Hoyt and Marsh. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
